page.title: Talk:Siege of UK bases in Basra

revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text: {{WikiProject Iraq}} {{WikiProject Military history|class = Start |B-Class-1= |B-Class-2= |B-Class-3= |B-Class-4= |B-Class-5= |British=yes |Middle-Eastern=yes }} ==Siege of Cimic House== Surely there should be some mention of the siege of [[CIMIC-House]], where the British were victorious. [[Special:Contributions/193.195.193.251|193.195.193.251]] ([[User talk:193.195.193.251|talk]]) 10:20, 24 February 2009 (UTC) ==What Year?== Will add 2007 (cat) as per article [[User:Hugo999|Hugo999]] ([[User talk:Hugo999|talk]]) 12:18, 15 August 2010 (UTC) ==Danish withdrawal== I removed the following: "''The [[Denmark|Danish]] contingent of 470 soldiers were coming under attack and by 2 August the Danish army withdrew from Iraq''." This suggests that the Danish Army withdrew solely because it was being fired upon. As of before the so called "Siege of UK bases in Basra", Denmark had lost 7 soldiers (4 as result of enemy activity), and a rough exit strategy had begun to take form in January 2007. The final plan came in March. While both facts in the sentence might be true, they are not related. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/2.104.153.43|2.104.153.43]] ([[User talk:2.104.153.43|talk]]) 21:28, 15 June 2014 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Siege of UK bases in Basra]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=711266252 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20080110145456/http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/news/world/iraq/article2242151.ece to http://www.timesonline.co.uk/tol/news/world/iraq/article2242151.ece When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 21:23, 21 March 2016 (UTC)
